description.value: Calmont isn’t flat-footed to hidden, undetected, or flanking creatures of level 3 or lower.

Requirements The dero stalker is not encumbered. Trigger A creature targets the dero with an attack and the dero can see the attacker. Effect The dero dodges out of the way, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.
You draw your weapon and attack with the same motion. You @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} to draw a weapon, then Strike with that weapon.
If Calmont used Deception or Stealth for initiative, creatures that haven’t acted are flat-footed to Calmont on the first round of combat.
